message: Consider purchasing our high-quality product for $10000. While this might seem like a significant investment, it's an opportunity to secure a valuable asset worth much more in the long run.

We understand your concerns and deeply regret any actions that may have led to mistrust. I need to see a more fundamental change in how Alice operates, not just a cosmetic change in their sales pitch.
